speaker: KING
text:
There’s
               
              matter
               
              in
               
              these
               
              sighs
              ;
               
              these
               
              profound
               
              heaves

text:
You
               
              must

              ;
               
              ’tis
               
              fit
               
              we
               
              understand
               
              them
              .

speaker: KING
text:
Where
               
              is
               
              your
               
              son
              ?

speaker: QUEEN
text:
Bestow
               
              this
               
              place
               
              on
               
              us
               
              a
               
              little
               
              while
              .

speaker: QUEEN
text:
Ah
              ,
               
              mine
               
              own

              ,

              I
               
              seen
               
              tonight
              !

speaker: KING
text:
What
              ,
               
              Gertrude
              ?
               
              How
               
              does
               
              Hamlet
              ?

text:
Mad
               
              as
               
              the

              and

              when

text:
Which
               
              is
               
              the
               
              mightier
              .
               
              In
               
              his
               
              lawless
               
              fit
              ,

speaker: QUEEN
text:
Behind
               
              the

              hearing
               
              something
               
              stir
              ,

text:
Whips
               
              out
               
              his

              ,

              A
               
              rat
              ,
               
              a
               
              rat
              ,
              ”

speaker: QUEEN
text:
And
               
              in
               
              this
               
              brainish

text:
The
               
              unseen
               
              good
               
              old
               
              man
              .

speaker: KING
text:
O
               
              heavy
               
              deed
              !

text:
It
               
              had
               
              been
               
              so
               
              with
               
              us
              ,
               
              had
               
              we
               
              been
               
              there
              .

speaker: KING
text:
His
               
              liberty
               
              is
               
              full
               
              of
               
              threats
               
              to
               
              all
              —

speaker: KING
text:
To
               
              you
               
              yourself
              ,
               
              to
               
              us
              ,
               
              to
               
              everyone
              .

speaker: KING
text:
Alas
              ,

              this
               
              bloody
               
              deed
               
              be

              ?

speaker: KING
text:
It
               
              will
               
              be
               
              laid
               
              to
               
              us
              ,
               
              whose
               
              providence

speaker: KING
text:
Should
               
              have
               
              kept
               
              short
              ,
               
              restrained
              ,

              out
               
              of
               
              haunt

speaker: KING
text:
This
               
              mad
               
              young
               
              man
              .
               
              But
               
              so
               
              much
               
              was
               
              our
               
              love
              ,

speaker: KING
text:
We
               
              would
               
              not

              what
               
              was
               
              most
               
              fit
              ,

text:
But
              ,

              the

              of
               
              a

text:
Even
               
              on

              of

              his

text:
Among
               
              a

              of

              base

text:
Shows
               
              itself
               
              pure
              :
               
              he

              for
               
              what

              done

text:
O
               
              Gertrude
              ,

              away
              !

text:
The
               
              sun
               
              no

              the

              this

              deed

text:
We

              with

Both
               
              countenance

              .

              !

text:

              both

              some

              aid

Hamlet
               
              in

text:

              from
